title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 249/93 of 4 February 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2118/74 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of reference prices for fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 249/93 of 4 February 1993 amending  Regulation (EEC) No 2118/74 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of  reference prices for fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 2118/74, the entry 'Berlin` is  added against the entry 'Federal Republic of Germany`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 February 1993.
For the Commission RenĂŠ STEICHEN Member of the Commission
